original_text: Which was the son of Jesse, which was the son of Obed, which was the son of Booz, which was the son of Salmon, which was the son of Naasson,
korean_text: 그 위는 이새요 그 위는 오벳이요 그 위는 보아스요 그 위는 살몬이요 그 위는 나손이요

sentences.original_text: Which was the son of Jesse
which was the son of Obed
which was the son of Booz
which was the son of Salmon
which was the son of Naasson
